data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 3
data.short_description: "View channel" permission for voice channels missing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any voice channel - Click on the 3 dots and open the channel settings - Go to `Permissions` - Create any permission override - Observe the permissions
